content: These recommendations sound amazing! I'll definitely check them out. I'm particularly interested in "The Devil Wears Prada" and "The Last Romantics". I've heard great things about those books. Have you got any recommendations for audiobooks as well? I've been listening to audiobooks during my daily commute, and I just finished "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" on February 15th, which was a lot of fun.
